import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Segment, Card} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" class TenderStatus extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ target: null, minimumcontribution: null, url: null, beneficiary: null, balance : null, donors : null, requests : null, raisedAmount:null, donateValue:null } } weiTOeth=(amount)=>{ const ConvertedAmount=this.props.web3.utils.fromWei(amount); return ConvertedAmount; } getTenderinfo= async() =>{ const info = await this.props.contract.methods.getTenderinfo().call(); this.setState( {minimumcontribution : this.weiTOeth(info[0]), target : this.weiTOeth(info[1]), url : info[2], balance : this.weiTOeth(info[3]), beneficiary: info[4],donors:info[5],requests : info[6], raisedAmount : this.weiTOeth(info[7]) }); console.log("inside tenderstatus") } clickHandler = async ()=>{ await this.props.contract.methods.donate().send( {from : this.props.account,value:this.props.web3.utils.toWei('10','ether')}) } render() { return (
{console.log(this.props.web3)}

Tender Status:

{this.state.beneficiary} Address of the creator This address can create request for collected amount {this.state.target} ETH {this.state.minimumcontribution} ETH {this.state.raisedAmount} ETH Tender Current Balance: {this.state.balance} ETH Number of Requests: {this.state.requests} {this.getTenderinfo()}
) } } export default TenderStatus
